phrases: I could just die right now.
A Place Further Than the Universe
The Follow Backs Do not Stop!
3rd annual middle-high school polar science contest
Seriously doubt we will find anything.
Why would you serve it hot?!
My grandma says it is only May, so...
Even if it is only May, it is still hot out!
And some sweets with it, too!
I request something of the pudding variety!
Do not you think this is a bit bizarre?
This, from the girl who came up with our last plan?
Do not you realize how embarrassed we were?
What was I supposed to do?
High School Girl Goes to Antarctica!
A high school aged celebrity will be going on a three month trip to Antarctica with the civilian expedition.
The planned civilian Antarctic expedition team has announced plans
to send a female high school student with its news crew?
The accompanying student will be celebrity Shiraishi Yuzuki-san...
She will be doing online streams about the trip to Antarctica
I did not know about this!
The expedition members did not mention a thing about it...
They probably realized the trouble it would cause.
Ask them if I go along with her.
I am the daughter of an Antarctic expedition member and a girl in high school.
I am not cut out for that sort of thing...
They are all strangers, after all...
I am gradually starting to understand how this girl works.
No way, no way, no way!
You want to go to Antarctica, do not you?
How dare you push this on me?!
You are Kobuchizawa Shirase-san, are not you?
Is not that the name of...
A child actress who started in commercials at the age of five.
Made her singing debut with The Follow Backs Do not Stop.
Shiraishi Yuzuki's 1st Single The Follow Backs Do not Stop
I could just die right now.
Uploading my image to SNS without permission is a violation of likeness rights.
Then can I get an autograph and a hand print?
She is not a sumo wrestler!
But what are you doing here?
Well... I wanted to talk to you.
Would you go to Antarctica in my place?
You want to go, do not you?
Reserved Today Antarctic Expedition Informal Meet-up
Do you remember the meet-up in Shinjuku before?
But what do you mean, in your place?
Put simply, I do not want to go.
TV Program Outline High School Girl Goes to Antarctica!
I am originally from Hokkaido, so I am sick of the cold, for one thing.
I think any high school girl going would fit the requirements of the project, so...
I told you that my plan would work perfectly!
Was this... part of the plan?
Is this the only way out?
New Dosanko Promotions Producer, Manager Shiraishi Tamiko
I keep telling you, I am not going.
I told these girls they could do it instead.
Do you really think it is your place to decide that?
TV Program Outline High School Girl Goes to Antarctica!
She just has to report on Antarctica, right?
I think she can do it!
I am c-currently... in... Antarctica... the weather...
People of Japan, are you seeing me?
Yeah... I want to go, but...
Th-This might be coming out of nowhere, but...
Sorry... I do not know just yet...
I told you before, did not I?
When you reach your second year, you will get more real time off.
Cannot you just bear with it for one year?
You do not have to worry.
I will make sure you are in time for entrance exa
I do not care about entrance exams.
I am not going to high school for entrance exams.
And here I thought we would found a miracle.
Too bad Shirase cannot talk in front of people.
But, Hinata-chan, you also could not
You do not have to rub it in!
That scarred her more than I thought!
New Dosanko Promotions Producer, Manager Shiraishi Tamiko
Apparently the girl is refusing to go.
If you can convince her to go,
I will recommend to the production company that you go as her companions.
In other words, if we can get her to go...
But Yuzuki-chan left, did not she?
Actually, she has a job in Tokyo on Sunday,
so she will be staying in a hotel until Saturday!
Which means there is no time to waste!
Then tomorrow morning, before we go to school.
Are we going to film her waking up?
If she is that set against it,
she must have a pretty serious reason not to want to go.
I thought she just said she did not like the cold.
That means she probably has a deeper reason not to want to go.
Well, I do not know that yet.
But asking about that should probably be our first task.
I was just thinking, you are probably right, Hinata.
At the end of the day, I have mainly been prioritizing my own feelings.
I have not been thinking about anyone else.
As they say, it is a thin line between self-assertion and selfishness.
Want to grab a bite, then?
Did you work that all out?
We are not sure yet, but...
Just pretend it is a coincidence.
I need to catch up on the classes I miss.
This place has free refills, and it is open late.
I am sorry, I have not made any more progress.
There is something else we wanted to ask you.
Why do not you want to go?
Is it strange that I do not?
And you can see the aurora!
My mother got to you, did not she?
Does she want you to convince me to go?
But I still want to know the reason you do not want to go.
Well, it is okay if you do not want to...
I do not have any friends.
Shiraishi Yuzu-chan Congratulations on your TV appearance!!
I have been a child actress since I was four years old.
But because I was so busy, I hardly had any time to play with friends.
Then it kept happening and happening.
I have never had a fight with friends.
My mom's the only one I fight with.
So once I got into high school,
I decided I had to make friends, no matter what.
I would go to clubs, get a part-time job,
buy sweets with my friends after class,
Let us go hang out some time.
Also, can we get a picture together?
Yuzuki-chan's a celebrity, so people want to see pictures.
First impressions are important, are not they?
I need to start working hard to form them right now.
You are basically establishing who you are.
I just wanted to hug you suddenly!
I always hate new school terms and stuff, too!
Because you are all best friends, are not you?
We have not even known each other a month.
We have never even hung out together.
We are just all trying to go to the same place.
Sorry to keep you out so late.
I feel a little better, having gotten to talk about it.
So... where does that actually leave us?
We came here to convince her!
Shirase-chan can go in her place...
If we convince her, we can go together...
Wait, but if Yuzuki-chan refuses, Shirase-chan can go in her place...
they will get some other entertainer to go in her place.
Convincing her was our only chance.
Well, I think this is okay.
Sorry... I do not know just yet...
It is the first time anyone's done that to me.
Is that what it feels like?
Come on, let us just go!
Come on, the wind is really strong!
I told you it was too early!
She is still in her pajamas!
It was Shirase-chan who said it!
What was I supposed to do?
We are going all the way to Tokyo.
We heard you had a job in Tokyo,
so I figured we could go together!
Sorry to jump on you like this!
It is all because she did not ask for your contact info.
We can go to the Tokyo...
But you are the one who said we should go together...
I am saying I will go if I can go with the three of them.
And I will not go without them.
Are not they nice and fluffy looking?
Hey, we can go inside this!
It is pretty cramped in here, huh?
I believe they use newer models of snowcats nowadays, of course...
Full speed ahead, and keep'er steady!
I do not think it is a boat.
This bunk bed only has a top bunk!
It says they keep the rooms over twenty degrees Celsius!
Because it will be negative ten degrees outside!
I bet my nose would be running...
I bet the real one is a lot more beautiful!
Yes, I have heard it is very beautiful.
My mother said it brought her to tears.
Most people do not get to see the aurora, though, do they?
Then if we really do get to see it,
we might be the only high school students in the world to see the aurora from Antarctica.
I could just die right now!
